channel.title: Help me on spawning a grim reaper on death
channel.description:
I am trying to spawn a 'Grim Reaper'. Whenever i die even when i'm killed by a player or an npc. The grim reaper will spawn right beside me saying something & teleporting me to some coords. And the grim reaper needs to be removed in 3 seconds whenever i am teleported. so here's the part i'm stuck @.
[code]server.npcHandler.newNPC(2862, absX +3, (absY + 2), //2862 is grim reaper. heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(2862), false); newNPC.Text4 = "OMG LULZ YOU GOT PWNED!" // not sure about this.[/code]
so i want him to stay for like 3 seconds and teleport me. anyone has an idea?. i'm editing this @ the boolean ApplyDead().
*Anyone?*
Regards, Shady.

item.title: Help me on spawning a grim reaper on death
item.dc:creator: @shadytheone shadytheone
item.description:
@shadytheone wrote:

I am trying to spawn a ‘Grim Reaper’.
Whenever i die even when i’m killed by a player or an npc.
The grim reaper will spawn right beside me saying something & teleporting me to some coords.
And the grim reaper needs to be removed in 3 seconds whenever i am teleported.
so here’s the part i’m stuck @.

		[code]server.npcHandler.newNPC(2862, absX +3, (absY + 2), //2862 is grim reaper.
                            heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10,
                            absY + -10, 1,
                            server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(2862), false);
			newNPC.Text4 = "OMG LULZ YOU GOT PWNED!" // not sure about this.[/code]

so i want him to stay for like 3 seconds and teleport me. anyone has an idea?.
i’m editing this @ the boolean ApplyDead().

Anyone?

Regards, Shady.

Read full topic
